11#ifndef MEDIA_BASE_VIDEO_ADAPTER_H_
12#define MEDIA_BASE_VIDEO_ADAPTER_H_
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15
16#include <utility>
17
18#include "absl/types/optional.h"
19#include "api/video/video_source_interface.h"
20#include "media/base/video_common.h"
21#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
22#include "rtc_base/synchronization/mutex.h"
23#include "rtc_base/system/rtc_export.h"
24#include "rtc_base/thread_annotations.h"
25
26namespace cricket {
27
28// VideoAdapter adapts an input video frame to an output frame based on the
29// specified input and output formats. The adaptation includes dropping frames
30// to reduce frame rate and scaling frames.
31// VideoAdapter is thread safe.
32class RTC_EXPORT VideoAdapter {
33 public:
34 VideoAdapter();
35 // The source requests output frames whose width and height are divisible
36 // by |source_resolution_alignment|.
37 explicit VideoAdapter(int source_resolution_alignment);
38 virtual ~VideoAdapter();
39
40 // Return the adapted resolution and cropping parameters given the
41 // input resolution. The input frame should first be cropped, then
42 // scaled to the final output resolution. Returns true if the frame
43 // should be adapted, and false if it should be dropped.
44 bool AdaptFrameResolution(int in_width,
45 int in_height,
46 int64_t in_timestamp_ns,
47 int* cropped_width,
48 int* cropped_height,
49 int* out_width,
50 int* out_height) RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
51
52 // DEPRECATED. Please use OnOutputFormatRequest below.
53 // TODO(asapersson): Remove this once it is no longer used.
54 // Requests the output frame size and frame interval from
55 // |AdaptFrameResolution| to not be larger than |format|. Also, the input
56 // frame size will be cropped to match the requested aspect ratio. The
57 // requested aspect ratio is orientation agnostic and will be adjusted to
58 // maintain the input orientation, so it doesn't matter if e.g. 1280x720 or
59 // 720x1280 is requested.
60 // Note: Should be called from the source only.
61 void OnOutputFormatRequest(const absl::optional<VideoFormat>& format)
62 RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
63
64 // Requests output frame size and frame interval from |AdaptFrameResolution|.
65 // |target_aspect_ratio|: The input frame size will be cropped to match the
66 // requested aspect ratio. The aspect ratio is orientation agnostic and will
67 // be adjusted to maintain the input orientation (i.e. it doesn't matter if
68 // e.g. <1280,720> or <720,1280> is requested).
69 // |max_pixel_count|: The maximum output frame size.
70 // |max_fps|: The maximum output framerate.
71 // Note: Should be called from the source only.
72 void OnOutputFormatRequest(
73 const absl::optional<std::pair<int, int>>& target_aspect_ratio,
74 const absl::optional<int>& max_pixel_count,
75 const absl::optional<int>& max_fps) RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
76
77 // Same as above, but allows setting two different target aspect ratios
78 // depending on incoming frame orientation. This gives more fine-grained
79 // control and can e.g. be used to force landscape video to be cropped to
80 // portrait video.
81 void OnOutputFormatRequest(
82 const absl::optional<std::pair<int, int>>& target_landscape_aspect_ratio,
83 const absl::optional<int>& max_landscape_pixel_count,
84 const absl::optional<std::pair<int, int>>& target_portrait_aspect_ratio,
85 const absl::optional<int>& max_portrait_pixel_count,
86 const absl::optional<int>& max_fps) RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
87
88 // Requests the output frame size from |AdaptFrameResolution| to have as close
89 // as possible to |sink_wants.target_pixel_count| pixels (if set)
90 // but no more than |sink_wants.max_pixel_count|.
91 // |sink_wants.max_framerate_fps| is essentially analogous to
92 // |sink_wants.max_pixel_count|, but for framerate rather than resolution.
93 // Set |sink_wants.max_pixel_count| and/or |sink_wants.max_framerate_fps| to
94 // std::numeric_limit<int>::max() if no upper limit is desired.
95 // The sink resolution alignment requirement is given by
96 // |sink_wants.resolution_alignment|.
97 // Note: Should be called from the sink only.
98 void OnSinkWants(const rtc::VideoSinkWants& sink_wants)
99 RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
100
101 // Returns maximum image area, which shouldn't impose any adaptations.
102 // Can return |numeric_limits<int>::max()| if no limit is set.
103 int GetTargetPixels() const;
104
105 // Returns current frame-rate limit.
106 // Can return |numeric_limits<float>::infinity()| if no limit is set.
107 float GetMaxFramerate() const;
108
109 private:
110 // Determine if frame should be dropped based on input fps and requested fps.
111 bool KeepFrame(int64_t in_timestamp_ns) RTC_EXCLUSIVE_LOCKS_REQUIRED(mutex_);
112
113 int frames_in_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Number of input frames.
114 int frames_out_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Number of output frames.
115 int frames_scaled_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Number of frames scaled.
116 int adaption_changes_
117 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Number of changes in scale factor.
118 int previous_width_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Previous adapter output width.
119 int previous_height_
120 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_); // Previous adapter output height.
121 const bool variable_start_scale_factor_;
122
123 // The fixed source resolution alignment requirement.
124 const int source_resolution_alignment_;
125 // The currently applied resolution alignment, as given by the requirements:
126 // - the fixed |source_resolution_alignment_|; and
127 // - the latest |sink_wants.resolution_alignment|.
128 int resolution_alignment_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
129
130 // The target timestamp for the next frame based on requested format.
131 absl::optional<int64_t> next_frame_timestamp_ns_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
132
133 // Max number of pixels/fps requested via calls to OnOutputFormatRequest,
134 // OnResolutionFramerateRequest respectively.
135 // The adapted output format is the minimum of these.
136 absl::optional<std::pair<int, int>> target_landscape_aspect_ratio_
137 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
138 absl::optional<int> max_landscape_pixel_count_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
139 absl::optional<std::pair<int, int>> target_portrait_aspect_ratio_
140 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
141 absl::optional<int> max_portrait_pixel_count_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
142 absl::optional<int> max_fps_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
143 int resolution_request_target_pixel_count_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
144 int resolution_request_max_pixel_count_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
145 int max_framerate_request_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
146
147 // The critical section to protect the above variables.
148 mutable webrtc::Mutex mutex_;
149
150 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(VideoAdapter);
151};
152
153} // namespace cricket
154
155#endif // MEDIA_BASE_VIDEO_ADAPTER_H_
156
